categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Padawan was with the Jedi Battlemaster Cin Drallig during the events of Operation: Knightfall. When Drallig confronted Darth Vader, the Sith alias of the fallen Jedi Anakin Skywalker, he and his Padawan dueled Vader. The Padawan fought Vader, with Drallig then using some of his Force powers to ensure the Padawan did not end up killed by Vader. After three instances of this, Drallig ordered the Padawan to retreat from the duel.
